test_description: This test covers topics related to the Network layer, including IP addressing, subnetting, routing algorithms, IPv6, and network layer protocols.

questions.question: What is the primary function of the Network layer?
questions.options_b: To route packets from source to destination across multiple networks

questions.question: Which of the following is a class B IP address?
What is the purpose of subnetting?
questions.options_a: To combine multiple networks into one
questions.options_b: To divide a large network into smaller, more manageable networks
questions.options_c: To convert private IP addresses to public ones
questions.options_d: To increase the speed of network transmission

questions.question: Which routing algorithm uses the shortest path first approach?
What is the main advantage of IPv6 over IPv4?
Which protocol is used to automatically assign IP addresses to devices on a network?
What is the purpose of NAT (Network Address Translation)?
questions.options_a: To translate between private and public IP addresses
questions.options_c: To resolve domain names to IP addresses

questions.question: Which field in an IPv4 header is used to prevent packets from looping forever?
What is the main disadvantage of distance vector routing?
questions.options_b: It converges slowly and can cause count-to-infinity problems
questions.options_c: It is too complex to implement

questions.question: Which IPv6 address type is equivalent to IPv4's 127.0.0.1?
What is the purpose of supernetting (CIDR)?
questions.options_a: To divide networks into smaller subnets
questions.options_b: To combine multiple networks into a larger network
questions.options_c: To convert IPv4 addresses to IPv6

questions.question: Which protocol is used to map IP addresses to MAC addresses?
What is the main purpose of the IPv6 Neighbor Discovery protocol?
questions.options_a: To replace ARP in IPv6 networks

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a transition mechanism from IPv4 to IPv6?

questions.options_a: To indicate the packet priority and type of service requested
questions.options_c: To detect errors in the header
questions.options_d: To specify the protocol used in the data portion

questions.question: Which routing protocol uses the Bellman-Ford algorithm?
What is the main purpose of BGP (Border Gateway Protocol)?
questions.options_a: For routing within an autonomous system
questions.options_b: For routing between autonomous systems on the internet

What is the purpose of the IPv6 Flow Label field?
questions.options_a: To identify packets that belong to the same flow
